transcript: and he again hurriedly opened his eyes and saw close before him the head and ears of the horse he was riding, and sometimes, when he came within six paces of them, the black figures of hussars, but in the distance was still the same misty darkness. "Why not? ... It might easily happen," thought Rost6v, "that the Emperor will meet me and give me an order as he would to any other officer; he'll say: 'Go and find out what's there.'
